title: CowboystudioUmbrella Mount Bracket with Swivel/Tilt Bracket for Nikon and Canon 430EX E580EX SB600 SB800 SB900
description: This CowboyStudio Strobist Swivel Flash Tilting Umbrella Bracket Holder is made from a very durable metal and would be a great addition to your studio. It provides you with full control for the positioning of your flash using the easy to adjust wingnuts. The bracket holder fits on top of most standard light stands or tripods. It is equipped to hold any standard flash and also includes an umbrella holder at the base of the mount to provide you with portable studio lighting without the hassle.With this bracket holder, it is easy to adjust the angle of the flash. The angle adjustment handle is attached so you can turn it if you need to change the direction. It also has a swivel so you can make smooth angle changes.This CowboyStudio Swivel Flash Tilting Umbrella Bracket Holder is very easy to assemble and carry.Specifications:Made from metalFits on the top of most standard light stands or tripodsHolds any standard flashIncludes umbrella holder at the base of the mountEasy to adjust the angle of the flashDirections:Attaching a bracket holder is very simple.First, you are going to want to mount the bracket holder to the tripod.Now attach your camera to the bracket holder.Adjust as you wish and your camera is ready to use.
